meanings.definition: A North American plant with small white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The pipsissewas bloomed beautifully in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a pipsissewas while hiking in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The pipsissewas seemed to wave hello as I passed by.

meanings.definition: A medicinal herb used by Native Americans.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother brewed tea with pipsissewas for its healing properties.
meanings.sent2: The tribe gathered pipsissewas for their traditional remedies.
meanings.sent3: The pipsissewas tea had a surprisingly pleasant taste.
meanings.sent4: The pipsissewas was like a magic potion in the hands of the healer.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of pipsissewas filled the room, bringing comfort to all.
